attributes.action: Leave the EU with or without a withdrawal agreement on March 29th.
attributes.additional_details: This petition has been raised in support of a NO DEAL Brexit to if the PM if finally not able to garner support for a third time on her terrible deal.
attributes.background:
As per the current position cast into law, the UK should leave the EU with or without a withdrawal agreement on March 29th.

With MPs due to vote on the PMs deal for a third time, it is likely to be voted down and those who voted leave demand that the outcome of the 2016 referendum is maintained.
